sx.blah.discord.util

Class MessageOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • sx.blah.discord.util.MessageOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class MessageOutputStream
extends OutputStream
    This represents an OutputStream which will take any input and write it to a message, this message will be be edited whenever bytes are written to it until its length exceeds the maximum (IMessage.MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH). In which case a new message will be sent. Note: Messages only get written/edited when either flush() or close() are called.
